description:
¢αℓσяιѕ is based on the Caloris Basin, the largest crater on Mercury. the animation represents an eye looking around in the vastness of space - something the planet must feel, being the smallest one in the solar system.

this is part of my 𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐯𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 collection. it combines my love for space & astronomy, with an abstract monochrome art style. every artwork is a satisfying infinite loop of motion.
